title: I work in 1st floor, interior room of a 2 story building. I do not get a cell signal inside.
content: 2 of my coworkers receive a cell signal. They have Verizon service. However I do not get a cell service inside the building. I have to step outside for emails and texts to update.  Why can't I get cell service inside the building while other people, with different service, can? Is Verizon better than Sprint?
